# models

The `llm.models` module for implementing the `Model` interface and utilities.

This module provides a unified interface for interacting with different LLM models
through the `Model` abstract class. The `llm.model` context manager allows you to
easily run an LLM call with a model specified at runtime rather than definition
time.

## <ApiType type="Alias" path="models/index" symbolName="LLM" /> LLM

The base interface for LLM models.

## <ApiType type="Alias" path="models/index" symbolName="Client" /> Client

The base interface for LLM clients.

## <ApiType type="Alias" path="models/index" symbolName="Params" /> Params

The base interface for LLM parameters.

## <ApiType type="Alias" path="models/index" symbolName="model" /> model

Set the model context with the model of the given id.

## <ApiType type="Alias" path="models/index" symbolName="Anthropic" /> Anthropic

The Anthropic-specific implementation of the `LLM` interface.

## <ApiType type="Alias" path="models/index" symbolName="AnthropicClient" /> AnthropicClient

The client for the Anthropic LLM model.

## <ApiType type="Alias" path="models/index" symbolName="AnthropicParams" /> AnthropicParams

The parameters for the Anthropic LLM model.

## <ApiType type="Module" path="models/index" symbolName="register" /> register

The register of models known to Mirascope.

## <ApiType type="Module" path="models/index" symbolName="google" /> google

The Google-specific implementation of the `LLM` interface.

## <ApiType type="Module" path="models/index" symbolName="openai" /> openai

The OpenAI-specific implementation of the `LLM` interface.

## <ApiType type="Module" path="models/index" symbolName="context" /> context

The model context manager for the `llm` module.

## <ApiType type="Module" path="models/index" symbolName="anthropic" /> anthropic

The Anthropic-specific implementation of the `LLM` interface.

## <ApiType type="Module" path="models/index" symbolName="base" /> base

The base abstract model interfaces for LLM models.
